TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PngBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class PngBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: Define un codificador que se usa para codificar imágenes con formato Portable Network Graphics (PNG).

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] formato metadatos de nivel de marco de mapas de bits soporte técnico.format bitmaps support frame level metadata. No se admiten varios marcos, miniaturas globales, miniaturas de nivel de marco, metadatos globales o versión preliminar.They do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. Codificación no funciona en confianza parcial.Encoding does not work in partial trust. Consulte [seguridad de confianza parcial de WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) para obtener información sobre la confianza parcial.See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo inicializar un para codificar una nueva imagen de mapa de bits.The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption Interlace { System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el mapa de bits de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] se debe entrelazar.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] bitmap should interlace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Entrelazado se refiere al proceso de mostrar un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] marco en dos campos.Interlacing refers to the process of displaying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] frame in two fields. Un campo contiene las líneas pares del marco y el otro campo contiene las líneas impares del marco.One field contains the even lines of the frame, and the other field contains the odd lines of the frame. Cuando el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] es ver, se muestran primero las líneas en un campo y, a continuación, se muestran las líneas en el segundo campo.When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] is viewed, the lines in one field are displayed first, and then the lines in the second field are displayed. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo usar el propiedad.The following example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
